description:
The go-to choice for cold days and tough terrain. With its very high upper, the Trapper Top GTX stabilises and protects the ankle. In addition, it also offers outstanding protection from rain, snow and slush. The Gore-Tex membrane mean that even streams, marshes and bogs get taken in its stride – with dry feet.

Inside, a cushioning midsole provides excellent insulation and prevents cold from underfoot. And the robust, but supple nubuck leather ensures a pleasant, comfortable fit.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion.
name: HanWag Trapper Top GTX - Mens
